meanings: (무섭거나 화가 나서) shake, tremble, quiver, shiver, shudder, quake
an income of 95,000 won after tax reduction

vlive.korean: 저희가 순서가 맨 마지막이어가지고 계속 있었는데 - 저도 계속 이 떨고... We were the last ones to go, so we just kept waiting. - My jaws were trembling too. 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP47. 아육대에 있지!
vlive.english: We were the last ones to go, so we just kept waiting. - My jaws were trembling too.

vlive.korean: 나 떨고 있니...? Am I shaking...? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.24

[영재 지금 떨고있니...] [Youngjae, are you shaking right now...] View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.06
지금도 떨고 있어, 지금 다리 떨고 있어 - 한 판으로 갈까요? He's still shaking. - Shall we decide with one game? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.90
vlive.english: He's still shaking. - Shall we decide with one game?

examples.korean: He was laying the flattery on with a trowel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 과장되게 아첨을 떨고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
